summary.event: 41st IEEE International Conference on Software Maintenance and Evolution (ICSME 2025)
summary.description: A conference for researchers and practitioners working on the maintenance and evolution of software systems.
program_highlights: Cutting-edge research on software evolution, maintenance, and analysis
Invited keynotes by international thought leaders
Panels, tool demos, and community activities
Networking opportunities with researchers, practitioners, and students from around the globe
Conference reception and cultural activities in vibrant Auckland
summary.equality_commitment: ICSME 2025 aims to be environmentally conscious and socially inclusive. Accessibility and inclusivity measures are in place for all attendees, including LGBTQ+, disabled, and neurodiverse communities.
summary.community_invitation: Explore Software Engineering research in New Zealand and engage with local researchers.
